summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to restoration and protection of Seattle's creeks; providing for the submission to the qualified electors of the City at a special election to be held in conjunction with the statewide primary on September 16, 2003, of a proposed measure relating to urban creek restoration and daylighting, as an alternative ("substitute") for proposed Initiative Measure No. 80; setting requirements for restoration and daylighting on City-owned property and creek restoration on private property, protecting high-priority creek corridors, providing for financial and other incentives for creek restoration and daylighting; and creating a Creek Restoration Account in the General Fund.
